sentences.en: A fluid fertilizer made of various nutritive elements and complex niter - phenol potassium salt is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种由多种营养元素和复硝钾配置的液体复合肥.

sentences.en: Coconut milk has little nutritive value.
sentences.cn: 椰子汁没什么营养价值。

sentences.en: Endosperm The nutritive tissue that surrounds the embryo in angiosperms.
sentences.cn: 胚乳:指包在被子植物胚外方的营养组织.

sentences.en: Glucosamine and MSM combine the nutritive benefits of two potent dietary supplements.
sentences.cn: 葡萄糖氨和二甲基砜两者营养的融合,是正常饮食后的有效补充.

sentences.en: In additin it has the nutritive components of carambola maintained.
sentences.cn: 其制备方法科学合理,简单易行,能够完全保留杨桃所含营养成分.

sentences.en: It can furthest keep the green tea's original color. smell and nutritive campestris.
sentences.cn: 最大限度地保持了绿茶原有的色香味品质和各种营养成分.

sentences.en: It is mellow, delicious, deep in color and high in nutritive value.
sentences.cn: 本发明工艺简便,味醇 、 味鲜 、 色泽深,营养价值高.

sentences.en: Much of the really nutritive material actually was refined out of food.
sentences.cn: 大部分真正有营养价值的物质实际上已从食物中提炼出来.

sentences.en: Much of the really nutritive material actually was refined out of the foods.
sentences.cn: 在食品加工过程中很多真正有营养价值的物质实际上却丧失了.

sentences.en: Now the nutritive value of the forage is reduced.
sentences.cn: 此时牧草的营养价值也下降了.

sentences.en: The process of mixing decaying leaves, manure and other nutritive matter to improve and fertilize soil.
sentences.cn: 混合腐朽的叶子 、 肥料和其它营养物质的过程,以改善和增加土壤肥力.

sentences.en: The product has high nutritive value, special and health function.
sentences.cn: 该产品营养丰富, 具有一定的保健功能.

sentences.en: This will decrease the nutritive value and the taste and colour will also change.
sentences.cn: 如果放置太外,会因接触空气而令维他命遭受破坏,而减少营养价值,同时味道颜色也会改变.

sentences.en: Thus, it is a nutritive sweetener but contributes very few calories.
sentences.cn: 于是, 它是一种有营养和热值极低的甜味剂.

sentences.en: You do not have to wash it and it is also very nutritive.
sentences.cn: 你不需要洗,但它还特别有营养.
